arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France stream live: Where and how to watch the match?

arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France – Zabarnyi expresses confidence ahead of the match against Les Bleus
arts.sum: At 23, Ukrainian center back Ilya Zabarnyi spoke at a press conference about his arrival at Paris Saint-Germain. The new Parisian player, signed this summer from Bournemouth, stated that he is approaching this transfer with calm and ambition, eager to shine with both PSG and the Ukrainian national team. “My transfer to PSG? arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France – The French lineup is confirmed!

arts.ttl: Ukraine vs France – Big news for Ousmane Dembélé!
arts.sum: Preserved since the weekend due to muscle discomfort, Ousmane Dembélé (28, Paris Saint-Germain winger) returned to training with the French national team on Thursday evening. arts.ttl: France XI vs Ukraine – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: France begin their 2026 World Cup qualification campaign with a challenge against Ukraine at the Tarczyński Arena in Wrocław, Poland on Friday. The Blue and Yellow host the former world champions on neutral soil as they continue to play their home fixtures abroad due to the ongoing war.
